messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Oh dear
messages.msgSnippet: Please comment on links you send to the list.  Tell  us what it is and why you think we should read it so that it s communication from a list member instead of
messages.messageBody:
Please comment on links you send to the list. Tell us what it is and why
you think we should read it so that it's communication from a list member
instead of just a link, pretty please! Thanks.

Sandra

messages.subject: Oh dear
messages.msgSnippet: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/education/3493342.stm if everyone owned a car, what a smelly, dangerous, noisy, stressful, unhealthy, expensive society this would
messages.messageBody:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/education/3493342.stm


if everyone owned a car, what a smelly, dangerous, noisy, stressful,
unhealthy, expensive society this would be... oh, wait... it is!
